name: William Moates
text: Loved it.

name: T Moraes
text: Serene atmosphere!

name: Julie Phillips
text: Wonderful service

name: Wendy Herndon
text: I would highly recommend a massage from Barbara.  She did an excellent job.  I will be returning for another on.

name: Catherine Roach
text: Allison has been doing my hair for years and is a talented color artist!  I couldn’t be happier with the quality of her work, the Aveda products she uses, and the hair salon overall.  Highly recommended!

name: Brooke Barton
text: Nancy Taylor Day Spa offers a wonderful, personalized experience and safety precautions are top notch. I also love the various lines of skin and haircare products, awesome gifts, and even special events like Christmas Open House! Go to Nancy Taylor for any gift you may need whether it is a spa treatment, stocking stuffer, or lux pajamas.

name: Sarah Mellown
text: Whether coming in for services or to buy a gift, every visit to Nancy Taylor Day Spa is amazing. Even after the Covid shutdown the spa is a clean, safe space that still gives you a relaxing “spa day” feeling. All of the employees are very friendly and accommodating, can’t wait to go back!

name: Evelyn Thomas
text: Great staff

name: Tara Scogin
text: I have been coming here for years and love it! I’ve gotten facials and waxing and they are amazing! Great experience and service. Highly recommend.

name: Brandetta B'Notchi
text:
Horrible experience!  Definitely will spread the word! Canceled my facial due to same day policy.... Because during my massage received a phone call from MY JOB...had to leave due to an emergency!
Very BAD Business!

name: Kelsey Bush
text: Sweet staff! Get you in super quick and always pleased with the service. Highly recommend

name: Bryeleigh Davis
text: I received a massage from Vanessa Rogers at Nancy Taylor Spa. It was amazing. I highly recommend her to anyone. I have had many massages and this was the best. She was super sweet and by far the best massage therapist I’ve had. Thank you Vanessa :)

name: Diana Wyatt
text: My daughter bought me a hundred dollar gift card for Christmas. Turns out it is only good for services. She bought me the card to be used for anything that I would like. They did not tell her that you could not purchase products. What kind of business sells gift cards and then proceeds to tell you how you can use it. No, thanks. I won’t be back.

name: Holland Jo
text:
Posting this for someone else.

Do not give these people your business. They will charge you more than advertised and their staff is incompetent. They are deceptive, purposely or not, about what they're actually doing to your hair. They won't give you the right color if you're getting it dyed. They use products that will ruin your hair. Some workers will literally rip some of your hair out trying to brush it. Just woefully incompetent and a terrible business overall. I can't speak for their massages but based on this absolutely terrible experience, these people deserve to go out of business.

name: Randy Latner
text: I always have a great experience with everyone that works the front desk and with my massage therapist Barbara.  I highly recommend getting massage here even if it's only for 30 mins.

name: Bethany Adams
text: Always a great place to stop by. Love the renovations.

name: Elizabeth Beeker
text: Great spa treatments, wide selection of products and friendly service!  It is always a pleasure and I highly recommend going to Nancy Taylor!

name: Cheryl Sanders
text: Kevin gives WONDERFUL massages.  I have done the 'whole day spa' experience before too and it was great.  I would recommend to other people

name: T Reed
text: This place was great for a manicure, but I went to get my eyebrows waxed last week and my eyebrows look the exact same as they did when I first got there. Very Disappointed. Didn't even look like she did anything to them. 🙁👎

name: Cynthia C Pasadeos
text: I purchased an $80 gift certificate for my husband and he chose to have a manicure and pedicure.  I was extremely disappointed by the results... not only were his hand and toe nails not filed smoothly, there was still dirt under his toe nails!  What kind of manicure/pedicure is THAT??  I would not recommend these services from this spa.

name: Quintina Thomas
text: It is the best place to go. Very friendly staff. Clean rooms and lounge area. The services are awesome and reasonable. Need to relax then stop by you won't regret it.

name: Christy Faulkner
text: The faculty is top notch.  Customer service are always very polite and helpful and Callie Gregory is WONDERFUL.

name: Katie Grass
text: The couple's massage is wonderful. They have really great customer service, and everything is clean. They're health rating is 100.

name: Imani Manley
text: This spa does not have great business practices. I had a last minute emergency and I tried to reschedule my appointment (I understand a fee for last minute cancellations) but they tried to charge me the entire amount of my massage. I really wanted to move the massage to a later date and they were not helpful whatsoever, all they wanted was the money. So they just lost a customer. I wish I could review the place but I can't because of their greedy business practices. From now on I'm going to spa belle la vie, they won't charge you if you have an emergency or have to cancel last minute. I really can't with this place

name: Morgan Batze
text: Terrible customer service, no one knows what they’re doing and things are very disorganized. Will not recommend to friends or be returning.

name: Connie Grechanik
text: Best spa in town!!

name: Sadie Murphy
text: Overpriced but great staff.

name: Joan Mccall
text: Nice spa

name: Stacy Rakestraw
text: Very nice experience!

name: Faith Rakestraw Grill
text: Love Nancy Taylor Day Spa!!

name: Tiffany Tarver
text: I loved every minute of it! The staff was so professional. The location was clean and relaxing! I booked my followup appointment while there!

name: Deanna Gerowski
text: Our couples massage was so relaxing and comfortable. The massage therapists were very professional and informative. We had a great experience from the moment we checked in until we walked out. We'll definitely be back.

name: Rhonda Taylor
text: Nowhere near as serene and nice as the previous location. Loud talking in the hallway. Brightly lit. Masseuse rolled around on a stool to get from one side of the table to the other. Sheet was dirty or stained. Headrest tattered and unsightly. Supposed to be for a 90 minute massage...Appointment was for 1:00. I was collected at 1:10. Walked back out in the lobby to pay at 2:20. Add in an additional 5 minutes lost to getting re-dressed. So yeah, more like a 65 minute massage though 90 minutes were purchased. Honestly, I was just ready to go and didn't bother mentioning it. Other than rolling around on the stool, the masseuse did a good job but I won't be back. This wasn't the "spa experience " that I'm used to experiencing.

resp.text: We do appreciate your feedback, as we have built our 20 year business on customer service. We are continuing to upgrade and renovate as we did at our previous location. This year has been hard on businesses, and has slowed this process down. We care about every single person who walks in our doors and the experience they have. We do wish you would have let us know, as we never want anyone to leave unsatisfied.

name: Myron Hall
text: Walked in and was greeted by receptionist and she said I’ve already have you checked in without me saying my name. Did not have to wait long before Mary came out and took me to the room. Mary was very professional and knowledgeable of her ability to perform a pleasurable experience. If I could I would give her 10 Stars and 5 Thumbs up.  ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️👍👍👍👍👍

name: Necca Tate
text: First time and last time there. I will not be back. I’ve had experience others massages in the past but this was the worst. We went in as a group and I was rushed to get underdressed l, time was cut in half. My group was still getting their massage while I was already finished. The person that was given the massage seems  as if she was scared to touch me. After we all meet up the discuss our massage over bunch mines was no where near as to what that had. $110 plus a tip down the drain for nothing. So it’s a no for me!! Sorry not sorry!!

name: J Mo
text: I really wish this spa would not have changed locations. The old location felt more like a spa. The lobby was spread out, a water feature and music were the sounds heard. You went to a locker room to change into a robe. A nice glass of wine or a mimosa was offered. The new location is small, has an overly bright lobby that feels more like a doctor’s office. You aren’t taken to a locker room and given a robe and sandals. The massage room was also too bright, as the windows were not covered well. There were sounds of people moving things and talking down the hall. There was very little sound insulation. There was no cafe to sit and have a snack. Afterwards, I asked if there were showers. I was directed to a small bathroom with very little privacy. The shower fixtures weren’t working properly. I really miss the sauna and hot tub as well. I’ve spent thousands of dollars over the years at this spa even though it was out of the way for me, but unfortunately I will not be returning. I want to feel relaxed and pampered, not like a patient in a doctors office.

resp.text: We apologize for your unhappiness with our new location as we are still renovating. Due to this years unexpected events it has been slower than anticipated. Of course, no one expects to move a 20 year old business, but with no roof and safe structure we could no longer feel safe. When life hands you lemons you make lemonade. We do appreciate your patronage over the years, and you will be missed.

name: Barbara Steve Harrington
text: I went in to buy a facial product.  The staff was super helpful and friendly helping me choose a product, but I was shocked that the front desk person was not wearing a mask.  For a place that is supposed to be a "wellness" center, I found this very irresponsible, especially considering the tiny front room/check out area that is impossible to maintain 6 feet of distance.  I'm disappointed- have been going to Santa Fe for about 12 years to get facials and skin care products.  I will not be going back until well after the pandemic is over and masks are no longer needed.

name: Lillie Allen
text: Love this place the people are so nice, and the environment is very calming to the point of falling asleep! The new sauna is amazing I got in before my massage, and the massage was breathtaking with candles lit around me while soothing music played. I will definitely be back 😁

name: Ann Browning
text: I had a 50 minute couples massage with the “new” Santa Fe Spa and Wellness. Do not waste your money. The time for my massage was cut very short, the atmosphere is clinical and not “spa-like”. What ever changes they have made at Santa Fe are NOT for the better.

name: olivia cissell
text: I’m not one to even write reviews but felt strongly about this one. I had the best massage I’ve ever had here a few months back with Melissa, which is the only reason I gave 2 stars. I called to request her and learned she was out for the week, so I went with the other masseuse there. I really just wanted a relaxing Swedish massage for my birthday, but oh my goodness it was so bad!!! I left feeling less relaxed than when I got there, along with shoulder pain I did not have before! I just laid there hoping it would be over soon! I’ll take my $100+ elsewhere next time...

name: Tyler Rhone
text: Ms.Tammy was so great , very professional, and great customer service!!!

name: alex faulkner
text: Santa Fe is and will always be the spa place to go to, even with the new location, we love going!

name: Christina Conklin
text: My fiancée and I had a couples extended sweedish massage with Melanie and Maryanne and it was amazing ! Will definitely be coming back

name: Beth Easterwood
text: I just love this place ! Everyone was so sweet ❤️❤️❤️I will be back

name: Susan Meagher
text: Awesome service with friendly staff

name: Casey Benefield
text: Fiance likes, I like. Nuff said. She enjoyed herself. :)

name: Moondust
text: Fantastic

name: Jan Tubbs
text: I had cool sculpting done at this facility.  No change appeared and I was told at other places that I was overcharged for the cool sculpting. I will not return to this facility.  The staff was ok but not real friendly.

resp.text:
It is exceedingly rare to see no result.
I will review your pictures and contact you tomorrow.

name: Debbie Crabb
text: I have not been in the office because they will not respond to me email.

resp.text:
We try to answer all emails- I certainly apologize if we haven’t answered you.
This is a difficult time and everyone is doing the very best they can.  I am sure you will find an office that can meet your needs.

name: Anya Nicholson
text: Dr Petro’s office is professional and clean. Would recommend despite bedside manor which needs improvement. Came in as a new patient for two separate appointments, both in which she made inappropriate off-topic comments about my appearance. With how clean and professional her office is, I would expect higher quality treatment to patients, especially those that are new. Will not be returning due to this experience on separate occasions.

resp.text: You should certainly find a physician whose bedside manner resonates with you.  Being comfortable is essential to getting the results you deserve.

name: Stacy Giovinco
text: Wonderful! Beautiful atmosphere that is calming yet professional atmosphere partnered with Cutting edge technology and a wide variety of medical and esthetic opportunities to improve health, well-being and personal confidence are displayed and explained . I am excited to become part of the Petro 'family'.

resp.text: We are very happy to have you!

name: Lisa Newton
text: I would not recommend this place for the use of Restylane for eye bags!  I had this procedure a few years back and to this day continue to have issues with it!  It looks horrible!!  The staff were friendly and professional though!

resp.text: I would be happy to see you.  Restylane typically lasts 6-8 months so if there are issues persisting for years it should be evaluated.

name: Anne Ryan Cavin
text: Thank you Dr. Petro! The new office is so much better.. great move!

name: J Sosnovik
text: Excited to begin my tattoo removal sessions with Tisha at Petro Cosmetic. So far I was very pleased with the costumer service and facility. I would recommend any family or friends to go in and visit Petro Cometic before committing to anyone else.

name: Grant Greenlee
text: Best ever!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank YOU!

name: Leema Lutfi
text: My friend and I got facial. TiAmber was our esthetician. She did amazing job and explained the process and product.  She seemed knowledgeable and welcoming.  Overall great experience.  Thank you

name: Des
text: I am highly disappointed with this location’s front-office service, specifically Debra. I had an appointment this evening at 5pm, but woke up experiencing illness so wanted to reschedule my appointment, especially in light of the Covid-19 climate we are still in. I called their office first thing (8am) and explained my illness to Debra and informed her I would like to reschedule. She gave me several run-arounds concerning why even though I was sick I could not reschedule. Even so much as stating the owners are the reason why if a patron feels ill they still have to be serviced. She then said half of my Massage Envy points banked for today’s service would be expensed because of the same day reschedule. I asked what concessions are made for feverish patrons. She said they are still required to show up and Massage Envy would take their temperature. I told her I would be going to the doctor’s office today and could provide an excuse. She said a manager would get back with me today, but no one ever contacted me. After having my suspicions proven that I had been lied to and no one would contact me, I called back to ask about what was the current status of my appointment/points. I was then informed the appointment was taken off the records and all of my points for today’s session had been expensed. I am extremely frustrated with their “customer care”. I feel lied to and with their “Covid protocols” that were exhibited today first-hand to me, I will NEVER feel comfortable patronizing them again. There is no telling how many patrons who have been ill (with or without fevers) have received service and unintentionally spread it to others with the help of this location’s policies. So much for this place being a standard of wellness services. I feel more stressed now after dealing with this than I did before. I wish I had NEVER booked anything with this location or had my home membership at this location.

name: Stephanie Hazen
text: I absolutely love coming here. As a single mom, I don’t have lots of money to spend on spa services. Because of massage envy I am able to spend a little time pampering myself. Whitney has done an absolute miracle on my face with products and chemical peels. I am so happy! With only one very light peel, about 75% of the dark spots I had from sun exposure are gone. The receptionist is absolutely wonderful. She works really hard to apply coupons and discounts whenever she can. The place has always been clean and welcoming. The staff is great. I did so a massage as well and it was very very relaxing. I got the membership and plan to make monthly visits.

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie, for your positive review of Massage Envy - Hoover. All Massage Envy locations are owned and operated by local franchisees who work hard to ensure guests and members are happy with the services they receive. We are so happy to hear you have had such a great experience.

name: Evyan Gallegos
text: Great communication with staff, felt really safe going in with all the covid-procedures.

resp.text: Reviews like this are important and it is greatly appreciated that you took the time to leave your positive feedback for Massage Envy - Hoover. Thank you, Evyan!

name: Maria
text:
Just had a massage. My experience was a 3/5 stars for the following:

1. There was a fan on me the entire time... For one hour, I was covered in oil (and naked with only a sheet covering me) with a fan on me in the middle of winter! I was almost shivering. The bed warmer was either not on or not working.... Bummer. Also, the light in the room was on the whole time... I like it dark and relaxing. Rooms need to be vacuumed.😞

2. My MT was clearly sick with something respiratory going on. Being that close and breathing over me sick was a major deterrent on a return visit. Not sure if he kept stopping the massage to wipe his nose or what but I've never had so many pauses in a massage. 😷I'm used to smooth continuous pressure/ touch during a massage except for when its time to turn. Also, no hot towels this time!!!😩

3. I feel like this particular chain is on the downhill... The past few times I've gone, you can never get the same therapist twice. It appears there is a lot of turnover here. It is noisy in the hallway out side of the room. I made sure to use all of my gift card so my friends and family can start giving me new gift cards to use somewhere new.😐

4. The receptionist stated she was going to look up my gift card towards the balance. I had two cards to use. She couldn't get them at first. Luckily, I had them on me.

*Overall, not a terrible experience but in Hoover, I have many other options to choose from for a good massage and I'll start seeking out those places next. For someone that splurges to have a massage 3 times/ year at most, my expectations were not met for the cost of services rendered.  Staff was friendly. MT gave a decent massage with good pressure (minus all the pauses).

resp.text: Hello Maria, thank you for letting us know about your experience at Massage Envy - Hoover franchised location. We encourage you to reach out to the franchised location through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW to express your concerns and allow them to help address these issues.

name: Tracy Durrett
text:
Quintette was great and I had a great massage. Debra was very nice and helpful. I also had a facial with Selena. She was late and I was suppose to have an hour and it was only 45 min at best. That included me changing and all. She never discussed products with me other than not to use an abrasive exfoliater on my checks.
She left the headband on and the bed raised up and I slipped getting down since it was still up. I would go back for the massage but would request someone different for a facial.

resp.text: Hello Tracy, on behalf of Massage Envy Franchising thank you for expressing your concerns and bringing this to our attention. Please reach out through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so this can be addressed.

name: Empty the Tanks
text: MJ was fantastic ! Great front desk staff!

resp.text: Thanks for your high star rating for Massage Envy - Hoover!

name: Angie Russell
text: Love it, I go for severe back and body pain. It helps tremendously

resp.text: Thanks for your high star rating for Massage Envy - Hoover, Angie!

name: Kameron Bell
text: Do not book an appointment here, I had a session set for my fiancées birthday, they called me the day of and told me that the person who was supposed to be doing the massage had quit and that they are gonna cancel my fiancées appointment, I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS LOCATION AT ALL, they are horrible!

resp.text: Hello Kameron, it’s regrettable to hear that you had a negative experience at your local franchised Massage Envy. We encourage you to reach out to the franchised location through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW to express your concerns and allow them to assist further.

name: J J
text: I got a massage for my husband as a gift for his birthday. The environment was comfortable and serene. As far as his his experience, he said his MT did an excellent job. There was one thing I didn't like and it was the young lady who asked about the membership.  No one wants to be asked that after a relaxing experience.  Maybe let the customer inquire about it first.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a positive rating! We're delighted to hear that your husband had a great experience with our team! We appreciate your providing this information so we can improve upon our services.

name: Angeles Vo
text: I got a mysterious rash on my arms after a massage. I notified the receptionist who put a note in the system. I thought maybe I had a one time bad experience, since the rash seemed to go away, so I went back the following month. I got another rash but this time it spread up and down my arms. My doctor told me it looked like a fungal infection but to be safe she would refer me to a dermatologist. I got a doctors note stating I needed to refrain from massages until the dermatologist could determine what the rash was and if it was safe to go back. I took my doctors note and filled out a membership cancellation form. I noticed my monthly fee was withdrawn after I had submitted the form so I called. I was told my cancellation was denied because I needed a note from the dermatologist. I can’t get a dermatologist note for another month when I have my appointment but even so, why is my doctors note not enough? According to their cancellation policy a note from a doctor stating one cannot be massaged for medical reasons should suffice. The manager didn’t even have the decency to call me! I only found out because I called them. I am out $130 and still have one more month before my contract is up. Not to mention the doctor bills. Do not go here! Find a better place to get a massage.

resp.text: Massage Envy is committed to a safe and therapeutic environment. If you feel you have not experienced this at this franchised location, please reach out to the corporate Guest Relations team at guestrelations@massageenvy.com with the details of your experience for further assistance.

name: Cheryl Brewer
text: Not enough space for all the issues. Charter member. Joined 10 years ago. Decided in May 2019 it was in decline and too difficult to book due to incredible staff turnover. Also, the experience had become totally inconsistent. Still fighting them for my legitimate cancellation. When I requested cancellation in May I had TEN unused sessions (because they are so understaffed). Had to burn through those first. Sent in my paperwork and have the email in my SENT emails to prove it. They deny having any knowledge and are still billing me! Totally unprofessional. Avoid at all costs.

resp.text: Hello Cheryl, on behalf of Massage Envy Franchising thank you for expressing your concerns and bringing this to our attention. Please reach out through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so this can be addressed.

name: xledllTroy Roberts
text: Great place and great service . Whitney was great . She makes you feel very comfortable .did a great job on my face I will be back .

resp.text: Thank you, we are happy to hear that you had a great facial with Whitney at Massage Envy - Hoover!

name: Stephanie Dameron
text: I read the reviews before coming in and was scared, but I had a gift card so I had nothing to lose. But the therapist, Quinette (not sure if that’s the name), was extremely nice as well as the woman at the front desk. So I had no complaints! She wasn’t pushy about buying a membership either. So I guess I was lucky and avoided those that everyone was complaining about. But I’d come back for Quinette!!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave Massage Envy - Hoover a positive review! We’re happy to hear that you enjoyed your gift card, Stephanie!

name: Mary Kathryn Weithoner
text: Receptionist was very rude.

resp.text: Hi Mary Kathryn - thank you for letting us know your experience. Please contact your local Massage Envy at (205) 988-6400 so they can address your concerns.

name: Linda Williams
text: Very good experience for me. Friendly and helpful ladies at the front counter and my therapist was courteous and knowledgeable. She took the time to explain what she was doing and why. Great!

resp.text: Hi Linda, thank you for the kind words and wonderful review! It brings us great joy to see our members and guests happy. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: ovetta morgan
text: I wish I could go every week so relaxing

resp.text: Hi, please do not hesitate to reach out if you have any questions for us! Thanks for rating us so highly!

name: Jennifer R James
text: Love this place. So glad to have found it. Have had a few different therapists & not disappointed with any of them.

resp.text: Thanks for your five star review, Jennifer! We're excited to hear that we earned it!

name: ByDezire
text: This place is ridiculous! My girlfriend scheduled a day out for my birthday! She didn’t get the reminder phone call that they supposedly do. When she scheduled the appt. the woman told her to arrive A FEW MINUTES before to fill out paper work. We literally pulled up 10 mins late because of traffic. The girl at the desk told us since we were late the paperwork would cut into the massage by 30 mins and said it wouldn’t be worth it! Also they would only charge 50% of the initial price for cancellation! We rescheduled and they charged the FULL price! My girlfriend literally wasted all this money on a massage and no one laid a hand on me! They’re very horrible with communication and policy between they’re employees! So much for having my first massage on my birthday!

resp.text: We're disappointed to hear that this was the experience you two had with us. Please message us through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so that we can address this further and try to restore your confidence into our business.

name: Sandy Kimble
text: Scheduled my appointment a few days in advance but when I arrived iwas told my therapist was changed to a female. I prefer male therapist. So I canceled the appointment.  It would have been nice to receive a phone call letting me know the other therapist was sick and had been sick for a few days which means he was sick when I scheduled the appointment.  Total waste of my time.  I won't be returning.

resp.text: Hi Sandy, we regret falling short of meeting your expectations, and we humbly ask for the opportunity to make this up to you. Please message us directly through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW. Thank you providing this information so we can improve upon our services. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: Brian Lavett
text: I've read these reviews and frankly I was shocked. I had a great experience! My therapist was not only cordial and professional, she also gave me the best massage I've ever had. I've had no issues with billing, and find the staff curtious and hospitable. My therapist's name was Leigh. I would definitely ask for her. She is great and seems to really know what she's doing. I would and have recommended this place to my friends. My guess is that the other complaints on here, are just unhappy people that find fault in everything.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to let us and others know about your positive view of our business. We are glad that you have found a therapist to your liking and find that our staff, as a whole, is living up the Massage Envy values. Thank you again for being a valuable guest and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Christopher Michael
text: I'm surprised to read the negative reviews on here.  I've had great massages with Chance and the customer service staff have always been nice to me.  Due to personal circumstances I had to cancel my membership with Massage Envy which was not an issue after my initial 12 months had ended.  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Christopher Michael, thank you for the kind words and wonderful review! It brings us great joy to see our members and guests happy. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: S
text: Wish zero was an option. Had a giftcard and made a 6:00 massage appointment, arrived at 5:45, got checked in by 6:00, waited 20 minutes and met therapist as I was getting ready to leave. She immediately made excuses for being late and blamed it on a computer system and iPad not showing me as being checked in. What she didnt realize was the fact she had been observed coming in at 6:00 with drinks and food, and eating, which was the real reason she was late, and unconcerned. Tried to take the high road, but she was agitated, ranting, cursing about how the rest of the schedule was all of a sudden thrown off. Also said she was sleepy and frustrated. Canceled my appointment because there was no way I could enjoy my massage with that type of unprofessional behavior. I'm still waiting on a call from the manager which I don't expect to receive. On a positive note, the 2 young receptionists were very cordial. I do not recommend this location at all! Sorry my family wasted $$ on a giftcard.

resp.text: Thanks for your honest feedback. We're deeply disappointed to hear that this was the experience you had with us. At your earliest convenience, please message us through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so that we can address the details of your review further.

name: Mckinney Chattman
text: Still feel great weeks later and one of the best massages I've had

resp.text: We're excited to hear this! Thank you, Mckinney! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Stephanie Clayton
text: I have been having an issue for 2 months now with this location.   After the desk staff not being trained well enough to handle the request, or just not wanting to, I have asked repeatedly to speak with the manager to no avail and have been transferred to his voicemail, again to no avail.  He will not call me back and he is never in or so they say.  Massage Envy advertises transferring a credit to another member's account (for a fee).  They have charged the fee and have yet to transfer the credit to my sister's membership at another location out of town. Twice now they have set up a guest account for her in Hoover, even after a detailed phone call on May 9, 2016 with a front desk staff to try and rectify this situation because when my sister asked her location if it had transferred and they let her know they had set up a guest account for a half hour in Hoover.  After no help from the Hoover location I called my sister's location out of town and they walked me through how simple the process is to transfer and they themselves cannot understand why I am having issues.  At that point I decided to ask for the manager and I still cannot get any help.  At what point does this surpass bad customer service and become deceptive business practices or fraud because I have paid for a service that they offer but am not getting it?

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to inform us about this situation. We have provided the transfer of your service, as requested. Again, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.

name: Lena Smile
text: My experience was very good. I enjoyed every moment. My therapist was attentive to my needs and very professional. I've had massages all over the US by licenced therapists from the phenomenal to the absolute worst. Massage envy is not only a good experience but it's a great value!

name: Jeannie Dickerson
text: Bad management. Don't do business here!!  I cancelled my membership back in November 2015 and started getting bank drafts again this month. I didn't freeze my account...I cancelled it!!  I've called twice in the past two weeks with no return phone calls. I went down in person and no manager was there and apparently comes and goes with no set schedule according to the staff. I simply want my account completely cancelled and my money refunded. I don't know if the manager is a coward or a thief. I will NEVER be doing business here again and will never refer anyone here for business. The massages were wonderful but the management stinks.

name: Latoya Cunningham
text: Chris the masseuse was amazing!! This was the best experience I have ever had hands down....I frequent massage parlors often! Sandy the esthetician provided me wi th a 5 star facial!! I didn't want to leave! Great atmosphere!

resp.text: Latoya, we are so happy to read such a great review about Massage Envy - Hoover! You really made our day today.

name: Latoya Cunningham
text: Chris the masseuse was amazing!! This was the best experience I have ever had hands down....I frequent massage parlors often! Sandy the esthetician provided me wi th a 5 star facial!! I didn't want to leave! Great atmosphere!

resp.text: Latoya, we are so happy to read such a great review about Massage Envy - Hoover! You really made our day today.

name: Jenn
text:
Almost impossible to get an appointment here. You must make multiple calls to get someone to answer the phone. There is a voicemail. I have left messages but no one returns the call. When I do get a person to answer they are obviously bothered or confused by my request to make an appointment.
The massage therapists are decent  but I absolutely dread calling to make an appointment. So much so that I don't use my massages like I should or could.
I let them charge my debit card once then found out at my next visit that they automatically added it to my file, without my permission, and can charge it whenever they want to now as evidenced by the receptionist telling me she didn't need my signature she can just charge me whenever I come in. Wow.

resp.text: Jenn, first thank you for taking the time to reach out to us with your review and for your praises about our massage therapists! We take great pride in making sure our therapist are well-trained and customer-service oriented. We are sad to hear that this experience did not carry over with our appointment setting process. We do try to accommodate every member and guest, and at times there can be issues when scheduling appointments. Please know that is not how we like to conduct business and that we are working on making changes to solve these issues. Again, we do apologize for this inconvenience to you and if you would like, please call Caleb at (205) 988-6400.

name: LaDonna Tedder
text: This place is terrible!  The main selling point for purchasing a membership was the extended hours they offer for appointments.  Who knew it is completely impossible to get an appointment during the evening and when you are lucky enough to get an appointment, they call a few hours prior to cancel the appointment stating the therapist had resigned.  I would definitely NOT recommend wasting your money here.

name: Brooke Robinson
text: I called in today in reference to a double charge on my bank account for my membership fee. Hannah answered the phone and was very unprofessional and definitely not helpful. Not only was she not able to adequately explain the reason for the double charge, she was refusing to provide any helpful information to help resolve the issue and disconnected our phone call prompting me to call again. I requested the manager and was told he had been out of the office for a week and she had no idea when he would be back. What a joke of an establishment. I requested the Regional Manager name and number, oh but I was advised there was no number for her to provide to file a complaint. Their employees need to be trained or as Hannah explained they do not get paid to offer customer service. I will definitely cancel this membership and tell everyone I know to not patronize this establishment.

resp.text: Brooke, We are very sorry that your bank account was charged twice. There can be issues with the system at times and would like to discuss this with you as soon as you can. Please know that is not how we like to conduct business and that we are working on making changes to solve these issues regarding customer service. Again, we do apologize for this inconvenience to you and if you would like, please call Caleb at (205) 988-6400.

name: Noah Shrader
text: My massage therapist was very kind, but she started late and ended early. The pre-massage wait wasn't very relaxing (should have had a much more calming waiting experience). Comparing to other experiences, this was pretty lack luster.

name: Joyce Moore
text: They did a really good job with the message on our body

resp.text: We're happy to hear that you had a positive experience with us and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

text: I have enjoyed every massage here and have been a happy member for almost a year now!

name: Haley Messer
text: I scheduled an appointment at the Massage Envy in Hoover over a week in advance and received a reminder phone call and voicemail the day before my scheduled massage to confirm the time and date. I arrived at the location at the scheduled time and they claimed that my appointment was on a different day. I told them I had received a voicemail confirming that the appointment time was, in fact, when I thought it was. They "apologized" by telling me that they have made the same mistake in the past and there was nothing they can do. They have a policy stating that clients must cancel at least 1 day before the massage to avoid wasting the therapist's time and I find it disrespectful and unprofessional that they don't hold themselves to the same standards. They were unapologetic and appeared unconcerned by the mistake. Don't waste your time on the poor customer service at this Massage Envy.

resp.text: Haley, we’re sorry to hear about your recent experience and thank you for sharing your feedback. Please continue letting us know how we can improve so we can better our services.

Spoke with Shelby the Manager.  She is trying to correct the problem, and we are pleased with her initiative at this point.  We continue to be members

text: This is one of the most unprofessional places I have ever visited. I canceled my membership but not before I had to wait an entire year to do it. I specifically asked for a certain time for my facial and had my massage cancelled the day before and asked to move my facial up to the time that my massage previously was set at and the lady confirmed the time. I came the next day at the time I arranged only to sit for 10mins after the start time and I walked out to inquire what happened and the lady couldn't even find me on the schedule at first and then she said oh no your at another time which was an hour later! I reminded her that I had changed the time of my facial to an earlier time yesterday and she got an attitude and was like no there's only one person that does the facial and she was already booked, well why didn't you tell me that yesterday!! They are a subpar massage place and I will not be recommending them to anyone! Also the massages aren't even good and they make you pay for an hour but only massage you for 45 mins...just a complete rip off!

They felt very strong and durable! These were 1 layer each with 30 second cure. Not sure what normal procedure is, but lasting 3 weeks vs. 6 days is disappointing.

name: Eric Luffman
text: I am huge on surprises! So I purchased a very expensive perfect package for my girl as a surprise Valentine's day present at this location bc ive sent her here once before and she seemed to enjoy it. Well the lady at the desk inquired on who it was for and apparently submitted the information under her name where as MY email confirmation went directly to my girl, where she called me informing me she knew my plans for her, spoiling the surprise!!! That should have never happened! I then called and explained my irritation and informed them I was coming for a refund. They called me back like it was no biggy like cool we can just refund this over the phone for you rather than saying hey i'm sorry is there any way we can make this right for you! I'm a funny, chill laid back dude, but if you ruin a surprise, that is my one and only immediate heartbreak bc that ruins the joy of spending lots of money to be able to see the expression on your womans face of how happy she is. Presents are for the givers and for the receivers bc we both enjoy feeling the happiness of THE SURPRISE!! Please resolve this issue, bc i'm a man of morality bc now my woman is upset with me bc I refunded the package but I simply can NOT do business with folks that aren't in it for the satisfaction of those spending their hard earned money! So now, I had Valentine's all planned out perfect to the T, I no longer have the "kaboom" gift available, and now there is all this negative energy between me and my woman bc I know she still wants the package but I can not allow it bc the surprise was so important to me i absolutely had to have my money back so that this place would know and preferably remember that they ruined something for two special people! I wouldn't dare ask for something free, I would feel bad for taking anything not earned, but as a man that runs  a business, I make free offers every day to ensure customer satisfaction and that they come back!! Moral of my story, do what is right, and right what you wronged!

name: elise sappington
text: I just left Cahaba Dermatology and I would say my experience could have been better. The doctor I saw was phenomenal. She was very well educated and informative. Although she seemed to be in a hurry and did not ask very many questions she was very considerate and kind. I feel as though I will have my problems solved by her recommendations. The nurse, on the other hand, was neither kind nor considerate. I hope that this was just a result of a bad day and that she does not treat patients like this regularly. She was short and made me feel like I was doing something wrong; when I was simply answering her questions to the best of my ability as a first time patient. I came to this clinic because of an acne outbreak that has left my self esteem low. Although I received products that will help me in that, the service from the nurse did not make me feel any better about my problem and instead made me feel as though I was being a problem. The individuals in this clinic have the power to help others feel more empowered in their own skin. I hope Cahaba Dermatology sees that and will do that.

resp.text:
Helping our patients feel empowered to address and resolve their skin issues is our mission. I am sorry we did not deliver for you on this visit. Please call our office and ask to speak with our business manager or medical office manager to see if we can provide a solution to this issue.

Regards,

name: Bailee Perry
text: I had a cyst removed by Dr. Wang and she was excellent. Her nurse did a great and gentle job numbing the area and I felt nothing during the procedure. They have a beautiful office and their staff is welcoming. I’ll definitely go back for yearly exams and recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: Great to hear. Yearly exams are best way to keep major skin issues from developing. Look forward to seeing you next time.

name: Erin Farella
text: Dr. Wang and her team are wonderful! They are so kind, thorough, and always listen to my concerns. They always make me feel so comfortable and more than just a patient. I highly recommend them!

name: Kathryn Sullivan
text: I did not have a good experience here. I scheduled an appointment, and confirmed my appointment time/date. Once I showed up for the appointment though, I waited for about a half hour before being told that there was some kind of mistake and they wouldn’t be able to see me for my appointment I had scheduled over a month ago. I understand mistakes happen, but I was frustrated that I took off of work and showed up at an appointment just for them to cancel it on me. They then said they would talk to the manager to make things right and call me with times I could reschedule, etc...they never called or even apologized to me for the huge in convenience.

name: Shanae Hunt
text: Dr. Wang was extremely kind, quick and knowledgeable. The staff were all super sweet. I had a wonderful visit and I do recommend. Clean environment. Very pleasant!

name: Michele Ralph Hill
text: Dr Anne Gerald gives a very thorough and complete examination.  She has a calm and soothing manner.  The facility is new and gorgeous.  They offer almost any service you could need.

name: melissa goggins
text: My son has been coming to Cahaba Dermatology for several months. The improvement is tremendous. Everyone we have had contact with has been helpful and caring. We love the staff!!

resp.text: Love to hear that your son's treatment is beneficial. Thanks,

name: Corie Betke
text: Thank you to the ladies at Cahaba Dermatology!  Everyone showed us patience and kindness.  I took my daughter in today for a second opinion and I am very glad that I did.  First time doctor appointments can be a little unnerving for my daughter and today’s experience at your office eased her unlike the first dermatology office we went to and Dr. Wang provided us with so much more information.  The first doctor we went to was obviously wrong.  Thank you😊

name: Helen Penfield
text: My experience was excellent.  Easy checkin and immediately made comfortable with a blanket and Netflix.  My PA , Elizabeth Smith, ensured I knew what to expect each step of the way.  She was concerned about my comfort all throughout  the process.  I’m so excited to see how my results last year k in about 3 days!   Very professional staff!

name: V Mo (vmosmoothe)
text: Really nice presentation but not that great of an overall experience.  Not impressed at all 😕.  Little engagement with review of treatment unless I asked. The technician had awful bedside manners. Really rude and short. Not for patients that maybe going through something or for individuals with limited understanding of your options. I was treated almost as if my insurance wasn't good enough. At check out, the rep tried to charge me almost 100.00 for a co-pay I didn't have😳. Now...... Follow up about the set appointment and the patient portal is excellent. PLEASE NOTE......Thats how they even got a star. Portal is easy to use if.......you follow instructions correctly.  Brand new facilities but I think they really are in the business of isolating the population that they serve. Hint hint.

name: pat ryan
text: after much attention to filling out info on the portal we were never about to complete a video appointment - we finally talked to Dr Groysman on our home phone. It was not clear to us as to how to do a video connect. Someone mentioned SPRUCE, but we never had heard of that. In future please make it more clear as to how to do a video appointment. Thanks, Marie West

resp.text:
Reading your review, it sounds like Dr. Groysman worked outside of the normal process to ensure you received the care you needed despite connection issues. We use technology as best as we can to provide telederm visits to our patients during the Covid-19 outbreak. We provide education on Spurce.com our telederm app, but things just do not always go as planned. Conducting a dermatology visit remotely is challenging, but we've taken on this challenge for our valued patients. We do not have control over third party applications, internet connection speeds, and other various factors, but we will work to provide excellent dermatology care in every way we can.

Regards,

name: Chris Williamson
text: Very friendly and accommodating staff!! I arrived at what I thought was my appointment time and date but My appointment was actually a different day. The front desk was able to work me in. Even after all that, my wait was not that long. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a dermatologist or skin care. Very knowledgeable also!!!

name: Megan Carroll
text: Super nice facility. Friendly staff. My procedure was quick and painless. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Glad visit was painless. Thanks,

name: Emma Perry
text: Very organized office, I was in and out in no time. Respectful, helpful, and knowledgeable staff. It was my first time going to Dr. Wang and her staff. Definitely will be back in the future!!

name: Kelli Parham
text:
From the moment I walked in I was treated with genuine kindness.

...From the lovely lady that greeted me when I walked in... I could feel her smile behind her mask.

...To the amazing nurse that made me feel at ease, answered all of my questions and made me feel comforted immediately. I really trusted her guidance.

...To the wonderful doctor that took her time with me and cared about my concerns. I feel great knowing I’m in here care.

...To the absolutely fantastic woman that took my blood with ease and great conversation.

Each person made my appointment a remarkable experience.  I was scared walking in and was smiling walking out!!

Thank you, ladies!!

name: Beth Meullen
text:
I met the doctor for a checkup and to remove a few spots. She was very knowledgeable and thorough with my questions. The nurse was also very professional. I was thankful that the doctor offered several options that could fit my budget. I did not feel she was over selling me to pay for their beautiful well designed office. I can say that everyone, including the front desk and checkout, were all extremely careful and professional!
Update: I received my bill. $725 to freeze my nose and one spot on my arm. Then I called in for a quote for blue light treatment. Each treatment is $300 more than 2 years ago. Plus when I google the average cost for this treatment this doctor is quoting more than double! Not saying I won’t receive good care but Wow!

name: Justin Drake
text: Called to set an appointment.  Before even giving me appointment dates, the lady was asking for my insurance card.  Then she proceeded to tell me everything was sent to the lady for biopsy which is a complete money sink and moneymaker for the firm when it clearly isnt required.  I would understand if red or any issues but just a cosmetic procedure is just a way to make additional money.  If they are this greedy out of the gate, you can only imagine what they bill...

resp.text:
When booking an appointment we do ask up front for insurance to best advise patient on coverage and/or any out of pocket costs associated with visit or biopsy. There is no way to advise if a biopsy would be necessary at the time of booking. Only the provider would make that determination. Regarding the "sending" or reading of the biopsy, our office has no financial involvement in this process. Samples are sent to an independent third party for processing and third party bills insurance or patient directly. Please call our office and ask to speak with our business manager if you have any further questions or concerns.

Regards,

name: Lynn Cummings
text: Staff were courteous, professional, and had very good customer service skills. Dr Groysman was professional. thorough , and very helpful in addressing concerns.

name: Lynn Cummings
text: Staff were courteous, professional, and had very good customer service skills. Dr Groysman was professional. thorough , and very helpful in addressing concerns.

name: Charlene Drake
text: The staff was very friendly and informative and helpful. I was thankful that I was able to go back with my 73-year-old mother as she was already nervous about the visit. We have been encouraging her to go see a dermatologist for a while with a spouse they were on her face and her back. So they made the visit much more relaxing and encouraged her and assure her it would be OK. Follow up visits And building a relationship was encouraging since this is something she is going to be meeting in the future for her skin health care.

resp.text: We know so many patients have anxiety about seeing a doctor. We try to make patients feel comfortable with the process. We are glad we were able to get your mom needed care.

name: Tamara Brewer
text: The staff was very pleasant and attentive. Dr Wang has a great bedside manner, listened to me and was very knowledgeable in her field of study. One of the best experiences I’ve ever had at a doctors office.

name: Jennifer Smith
text: I was only in for lab work but the medical staff had me relaxed and happy. Who knew having blood drawn could be pain free? Thank you!

name: Valery Danielle (Danielle) Wormley
text: Dr. G is amazing!! Very thorough and knowledgeable on all aspects. Always seen on a timely manner and leave with a solution every time! My mother and I love Dr. G and will be forever patients!

name: LaQuoya Robinson
text: My second time receiving a facial at Spa Cahaba and it was ABSOLUTELY AMAZING! My aesthetician this time was Kayla Fisher. She assessed my skin thoroughly prior to the facial so she was knowledgeable of how to treat it during the Signature Facial. I can’t rave about this place enough! From the knowledgeable and friendly staff to beautifully designed and clean facility. You won’t be disappointed! I can’t wait until my next appointment.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback and we are so glad you enjoyed your visit. We look forward to seeing you again and will pass along your kind words for Kayla.

name: MultiplesOfNico
text:
Great service!! I came from Tuscaloosa.
Got there early. Waiting room was clean and log into the WiFi quickly.

Customer service was excellent.
My doctor took my concern and made me feel like I was heard.

Front desk excellent and the place looked very clean.

Happy to have an wonderful experience.

name: Dianna McQueen
text: I had to wait too long before seeing the Doctor. My appointment was at 9:50 and it was 10:57 before seeing the Doctor. Once I was in the patient room it took less than 10 minutes for my visit with her. I almost left before being call back but I was too eager for the Doctor to check a place on my chest. I feel my time is valuable also!!

name: Sarah Gentry
text: Lovely experience, Dr Groysman is the best. I have seen several dermatologists before, none of them have been as professional, kind, knowledgeable and understanding as Dr Groysman. Everything was seem less from check in to check out.

name: Pam Griffith
text: Everyone was so nice. Treated you as if you were family. Doctor explained things to make it simple!

name: J Russell
text: I arrived exactly 10 minutes prior to my appointment time,checked in and waited for exactly 1 hour. I got up to go to the ladies room, and when I came back another patient in the waiting room told me they had called my name. I walked to the back to tell them that I was just in the ladies room, they said we went ahead and called someone else back you'll need to wait until they're done. Granted I was in the ladies room for all of 3 minutes, there was no one to tell at the front desk that I had to go to the ladies room.  All of that after I already been waiting for 65 minutes!!!!!  They showed zero remorse... no apologies, just "oh well..go and wait some more". I will NEVER GO BACK and I will make sure I spread the news...

name: Amy Bolt
text: I am so very appreciative of Dr. Wang and Dawn. They are very attentive and compassionate. I highly recommend Cahaba Dermatolgy.

name: Connie DeVoe
text: Even dealing with a power outage due to Tropical Storm Zeta, the staff were all friendly & as accommodating as they could be until power was restored. They fit me is as soon as possible and the doctor provided a clear care plan with detailed instructions.

name: Andy Barclay
text: Such attention to detail! Everyone in the office is friendly and courteous. Dr Groysman is outstanding!

name: Empty the Tanks
text: Amazing! Shelby at the front desk was absolutely wonderful and I highly recommended Shelly for a massage! She was exactly what I needed to relax and unwind!

name: Daphne Kirkpatrick
text: Let me just say we had the BEST deep tissue massage today with Kari! She will be the reason we go back! Best massage we have ever had! And sweet Shelby is always smiling on Saturday mornings. Absolutely love these people!

name: Keith Wills
text: I had an amazing experience this morning. Dr. Wang was amazing and Stephanie was awesome. It only took about 15 minutes for them to give me a prescription and send me about my way! This will be my new dermatologist from here on out!

name: Tracy Fleischmann
text: Very friendly for self pay patients. Upfront pricing with no nasty surprises. Knowledgeable doctor who didn't insist on unnecessary procedures. A good first dermatology experience. Definitely recommend.

name: Su Kim
text: Amazing service. All the staff were so kind. They helped us figure out the best treatment while looking out for us financially.

name: Court Deaton
text: Horrible. Dr Gerald is rude and condescending and makes you feel stupid every time you speak. Would not ever recommend!

name: Carolyn Willingham
text: I go to Dr. Groysman every 3 months for body checks.  Each time she is very thorough.  She has removed 4 skin cancers over the last 12 months without using Mohs surgery with very minimal scarring.  She and her staff are awesome!  I could not ask for a better dermatology group.

name: Michelle McGrew
text: I loved the assistant and Dr.Wang both were friendly and put me at ease. Will be back

name: Gloria Sanders
text: My first visit was awesome. The staff was very friendly and helpful. I look forward to trying some of the other services. Highly recommend.

name: marquiz savage
text: My visit was as comforting as possible.  Ever thing from the initial check-in to the check out was 1 heck of a gathering.  Everything was so smooth. Dr. Gerald and Dawn really laid all pertinent info for me on the table along with the appropriate way to tackle my skin issues.

name: Matthew Ware
text: I showed up at 1:50 in the afternoon for my 2:00 appointment and didn't get called back until 3:11. And that was only after I'd ask the receptionist what time my appointment was actually for. My time with the doctor only lasted 12 minutes. Multiple people in the waiting room had apparently been told that they showed up for their appointments at the wrong time. Unfortunately for the receptionist, most were able to show their appointment confirmation emails. One patient was saying that this has happened every time she's been there. Sounds like they've got a computer system to figure out, or at least need to do some remedial training on the check-in process. The doctor was fine, but patient support was seriously lacking.

resp.text: Mr. Ware, I am sorry to hear your visit took so much extra time. We  do strive to stay on time as possible. There are many reasons the clinic can run behind, but we obviously missed the mark for you. I will inquire about recurring issues with appointment times or other issues at the check in desk. Thanks for your feedback and we'll work to use it to address your concerns.

name: Judy Bresnan
text:
Have had the most amazing facials with Joy!! She is so knowledgeable not only about skincare products but what your face actually needs! Can't say enough good things about her.
I also had an wonderful time floating with my daughter. Had never done that before and it was so peaceful and relaxing wanted! Wanted something special to share with her and I have to say this fit the bill nicely. We both thoroughly enjoyed. The staff were so helpful through each process and we got snacks!!

resp.text: Spending an hour with Joy is always enjoyable. Adding a float makes it even better. Thanks for your feedback and visiting our office.

name: Karen Thompson
text: Cahaba Dermatology is awesome. The staff and the doctor was very kind and helpful. Each person explained each step of the visit, from check in to completion of my visit. I highly recommend Cahaba Dermatology.

name: Emily Westray
text: This was my first spa experience ever, and I got my eye lashes tinted. They look great! And the staff was so friendly. Very pleased, and can’t wait to go back!

resp.text: We are honored to have been apart of your first spa visit. Don't let it be your last, you deserve it! See you soon.

name: Cindy Partlow
text: Staff are pleasant and efficient.Dr. Groysman and her PA were  professional, friendly, and thorough. All of my concerns were addressed In a caring manner. Highly recommend to anyone!

name: Peyton Gans Booth
text: Dr. Gerald was so sweet and understanding. Listened to every word I said and took it into account. So refreshing to finally see a doctor who cares!! Highly recommend.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback. Caring for our patients is a cornerstone of our office. Everything good starts from that single place.

name: Marsha Majors
text: Had a much needed massage today with Kari — I feel so much better after a long weekend of moving! Very friendly/clean/relaxing atmosphere! Will definitely be back👍🏼

resp.text: Moving can be both stressful and tough on the body. A massage was surely in order. Glad you got some relief from your visit and look forward to seeing you soon.

name: Stephanie Stephens
text: Such a wonderful experience! I met Dr. Ann Gerald and she was amazing! Very thorough and listened. Eager to help me with my unique issues due to a rare autoimmune disease. Highly recommend!!

name: Larry Thompson
text: Make you feel you are getting the best treatment possible. Staff and doctors are great.

name: kay chenoweth
text: Dr Grossman at Cahaba Derm is not only five star but a Rockstar!  She's been treating me since 2016 and done an amazing job. I Would recommend to her for any skin or health issues!

name: Cecelia Thompson
text: Hour massage with Carrie and Facial/Extraction with Tracy. Both were wonderful. I felt very comfortable.  They were thorough and very knowledgeable. High quality service! I will be back!

resp.text: That sounds like a great visit and glad you enjoyed the services. We are happy to have both Kari and Tracy on our team.

name: Caroline and Evan Crisp
text: My fiance and I decided to do a couples massage together to celebrate our engagement and I am so glad we did! The experience from start to finish made us feel so special. We felt as if we were the only clients in the building. The staff were friendly, courteous, and attentive. They took great pride in helping us feel comfortable and at ease. My fiance said that we will definitely be back for more services together.

name: James Hillegass
text: I recommend Cahaba Dermatology. Parking is easy, wait is usually short, staff is very friendly and Dr Groysman is great.

name: Penny Weldon
text: Nurse, Dawn was so warm & friendly to me. My Dr was equally fabulous, professional and so kind in examining and taking care of my skin issues. She froze them off and thoroughly explained what she was doing. Both of them eased my fears and made this such a calming process.

text: Kayla was so nice! It was my first facial, and I didn’t really know what to expect, but she was great! I definitely recommend getting a facial done here. They will treat you right!

name: Tara Murphy
text: Amazing staff.. very helpful.

name: Sonya Roshell
text: Very pleasant and professional experience from the receptionist to the nurse to  Dr.  Gerard. AAA+++

name: April Butler
text: The office was clean and the atmosphere relaxing. The staff was very friendly and respectful. The doctor was very informative and explained everything in a way I understood.

name: Louise Czapala
text: Super compliant with safety measures regarding COVID-19! Staff is attentive & helpful. My wait time was longer than expected, but not excessive. Very pleased with Doctor & plan of action!

name: Steven Stanfa
text: Cahaba dermo is great! I have been with them about year for an allergic reaction I acquired with my job. They were very profesional and courteous with me. The doc I was seeing left and the transition to the new doctor was seamless and easy. They are very responsive with needs. I needed papwork/notes/diagnosis stuff the day of appointment and it was available about an hour after my appointment. Would recommend to anyone for dermotology needs.

name: Noah Whitaker
text: Dr. Groysman is fantastic!! She has helped me is so many ways!! If you ever need a fabulous dermatologist please visit Dr. Groysman at Cahaba Dermatology.

name: Carol Schablow
text: Love Cahaba Dermatology! They offer so many services and their staff is so knowledgeable

name: Jim Imhof
text: Very professional encounter. Efficient check in, nominal wait time, courteous treatment and Dr Grosman did a systematic check of my skin. Very please with experience 👍

name: Bessie Tan
text: Kari did an AMAZING job of getting my tight shoulders/neck/back to relax. She was professional and pleasant and I feel a gazillion times better after my massage! Im looking forward to my next one already!

name: Deborah Lambert
text: Very accommodating and friendly!  Cari, the massage therapist, found all my problems areas and took care of them. The massage was tailored to what I needed!

name: John D Williams
text:
Kind, considerate staff & a nice facility. Cahaba Dermatology is a class organization.
Keira, Laura & Amanda were the ones I remember but everyone was very friendly & helpful.

name: Brandon Killingsworth
text: The appointment service was prompt and speedy. The staff and doctors were very courteous and caring.

name: david r. Daniels
text:
A very good appointment
Gabriel was very kind and helpful. The doctor came in and helped me and Gabriel finished up. She was very professional and did a great job helping me with my prescriptions

name: Brittany M. Whetstone
text: I will absolutely be back! This place is everything you would want when going to pamper yourself! Everyone is super nice, all smiles. The environment is full of positive vibes and I love ❤️ that! They make you comfortable and have much to offer. I recommend Cahaba Dermatology to anyone looking for a place to get a facial or any pampering needs!

name: Nicole Compher
text: Great first experience and pleasant staff! I thought that the deposit was the cost of the facial, so I was caught off-guard by how much I spent, but would go back again. Also, the lady at the front desk hooked me up with coffee and a breakfast bar!! Just what I needed from a spa

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed your visit. Sorry there was some confusion on the deposit payment. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Marlana Smedley
text: Horrible went in for laser hair removal and ended up with multiple burns. I sent pictures in and was told to come into the office so they could take a look. When I got there Dr Groysman was extremely rude and arrogant. She proceeded to tell me that they put the laser on the “African American setting”, which there’s no such thing. I’ve had laser hair removal done  before and knew what to expect from the process...and burns were not it. If you are African American I would advise you not to go here. Spend your money where you will be treated with respect. I would give zero stars if it was an option

name: Ray Robbins
text:
The waiting room was very comfortable but the wait was so short that I did not have time to read before I was called back to an examination room.  There the assistant asked the normal standard questions.  She was nice and courteous.  She instructed me as to what to do to be prepared for the doctor to make her examination.  Almost as soon as I was undressed and in the gown given to me to wear, the doctor came in.  The doctor was very warm and polite and quickly began her examination to determine if I had any molds of concern.  She was very professional and did find one mold that was questionable so she took a biopsy of that mold.
I am so pleased with the care given to me, that I highly recommend Cahaba Dermatology.

name: Adelle Sims
text:
Arrived early and had to wait an hour and a half to see the doctor.
Nurse and doctor both rude, especially nurse.
Terrible staff.
Terrible service.

Nurse kept calling me mom and talking down to me because I had to leave because I was late to a work appointment (didn’t plan on having to wait so long to see the doctor).

Would Not recommend this office to anyone!

name: D Thompson
text: Very professional, the doctor explained things thoroughly and there was not a long wait.

name: Amelia Johnson
text: Always extremely clean and everyone is friendly. Saw the new Doctor, Dr. Wang, and she was very thorough; I felt very comfortable with her and her assessment of my skin.

name: Will Abreu (beautybyWill)
text: Have been there before for skin issues and they have always been great! This time went for my first round of Botox and they were wonderful with that too. Definitely going back when it wears off and get my filler too next time

name: Amy Everson
text: Forget everything you know about a dermatologist office! I cannot say enough positive things about Spa Cahaba! It’s a beautiful spa that offers all the amenities you want when looking for a spa day of pampering. I went in to float in their float pool (if you’ve never heard of it, look it up- amazing experience!) and came out SO relaxed. I followed it up with a massage from Elizabeth- amazing! She was so careful to address my individual needs, checked in on the pressure to ensure I was comfortable and having a positive experience. It helped my chronic pain and relaxed me to the point that my nightly sleep improved immediately. Everyone was so kind and helpful. Beautiful quiet room, snacks, drinks, etc. Fluffy robe and slippers, you name it. They showed me around and made sure I had everything I needed. I can’t wait to go back!

name: Ken Blake
text: My wife and I both had appointments today with Dr. Wang. Everyone was great and we were out quickly!

name: Quenetta Barbee
text: Always very pleasant and professional. Wait time is very minimal. The staff is very good with explaining all medications.

name: Gretchen Covington

The office is very clean and modern. I’ve had acne scars for quite some time... I’m finally beginning my journey and couldn’t feel better about it!

name: Robin Oglesby
text: I love Cahaba Dermatology. Great doctors and amazingly, awesome staff!

name: richard weinstein

name: Khanijah Richardson
text: They are super fast! They had me in and out of my appointment in no time! Additionally, they are extremely helpful! I highly recommend them!

name: Jan Nunnally
text:
Masks worn by all.. got to me in a timely manner.
Very pleased!

name: Debra Lee Talbott
text: very awesome experience, polite & super friendly staff & comfortably pleasant environment.

name: Burthia Booker
text: This is the dermatological/spa experience that I have been looking for in Birmingham. Professional, attentive, with staff and estheticians that actually listen and are more interested in healthy, beautiful skin than selling expensive peels and treatments without actually examining their client's skin. I have been working with Dominique,  and she is amazing. Friendly, interested, and caring with exceptional technique and insight. I look forward to continuing my journey with her towards healthy, beautiful skin.

name: Deborah Brooks
text: Everyone is very professional and courteous.

name: Monique Houle
text: Efficient, quick, friendly service all around, didn't even have to wait more than 5 minutes past appointment time. I was impressed!

name: Dona Luna
text:
The staff at Cahaba Dermatology is very professional and friendly.
Tracy Humphryes is one of their aestheticians and is extremely knowledgeable and an expert in her field.  I would highly recommend her to anyone.

name: Jennifer Howard
text: Dr Groysman does an excellent job and she is wonderful with her patients!!! I have been coming here for over a year now and every experience has been wonderful! I recommend them to anyone that is needing help or wants cosmetic work done they are awesome!!! Staff is wonderful too

name: Ac Drummer
text: It was very good,l will give a 5""

name: Latrice Mason
text: I Love This Establishment...Everyone Is Very Polite and Professional!!!

name: Ken Gross
text: I really like all the staff, the facility and everything about Cahaba Dermatology and Health Spa.

name: denise jeffries
text: Dr Groysman is the best.

resp.text: Thanks for kind words

name: Aisha Hoyle
text: The dermatologist that I saw was very professional, gave me some direct, factual answers to an issue that I have been worried sick about for almost 4 years. Also, while I was waiting, I was looking at their products for different skin types, and they had someone right there that specializes in that to help! I have rosacea and my face gets really angry at times, to the point of hurting down to my bones in my face, and I bought three products for my skin type that they suggested, and the total was only $104.00. That may sound like a lot, but I bought the largest size of two of the products, and she even told me...”open the spray first, it was the least expensive, and spray your face with it, and you will tell a difference within 3 minutes,”and I did! It was so soothing and calmed my face down as I sat in my car before leaving! She told me if I didn’t get a result from that, bring the other two products back and get my money back! When she said that, I knew she was genuinely trying to help me, and she did! My face has never felt as good as it feels, and looks from using these particular products! I have spent a lot of money trying to buy healthy products, trying to get some relief, to the point that my husband was not happy, at all, whenever I wanted to order another product! All I can say is that I felt like everyone there, was there to truly help people. Skin issues can be a very personal issue and it has been very difficult for me, but my skin is doing better than ever! I made an appointment for my 14 year old son that day, and another for myself! I won’t be going anywhere else. Cahaba Dermatology is top notch!

name: Temple Marston
text: My 84 year old father came in to float in the salt water float pool. He thoroughly enjoyed every moment at the spa.  He was greeted with warmth and kindness and it didn’t stop there.  He was pampered and left walking better, relaxed and feeling better overall.  The staff have customer service down and go above and beyond to help and make patients feel special.

name: Briana JTV
text: I was only there for around 20 minutes and I fell in love. It smells wonderful everyone was so sweet and pleasing. They made me feel so comfortable and I will gladly be going back.

name: Elaine Jackson
text: I love Cahaba Dermatologist and my Doctor there Dr. Groysman and the staff are all professionaly polite and friendly.. I'm improving and i feel good going there

name: Jessica Stodden
text: Very clean and nice. They have been very helpful thus far

name: Cindy McRee
text: Wonderful, friendly, professional and clean practice. Dr. Ann Gerald is an excellent dermatologist!

name: Sandra Evers
text: Fabulous one to one information and follow up care!!! I was nervous and the clinician made me feel so comfortable and at peace.  Great environment and friendly service 👍.  I would highly recommend!

name: Katherine Morgida
text: Very posh office and environment, the staff are always polite, professional, and take my concerns seriously. I have even been able to email them a picture after having an unexpected reaction to a medication. They provided help and a new treatment plan without me having to schedule and pay for an additional office visit so close after the last one. The nursing staff reassured me they would be there to help if anything else came up. Truly, they go above and beyond to provide high quality care. They will also help you get your medications affordably by sourcing from mail order pharmacies if your insurance is being difficult. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐, They're the best.

name: Meleah Montgomery
text: I was a new patient because my old dermatologist could not see me in a timely manner. I sent out a request on yelp to be seen by a dermatologist and they responded immediately and said I could be seen the NEXT DAY! They staff was so friendly and inviting! The paperwork was all online so it was easy to get it all done. I was in and out in less than an hour. They have some skin care products available for purchase, but they also suggest cheaper options if people do not want to spend too much. I saw Dr. Gunn and she was amazing and understood my need to see her. When I left I was still confused on my skin care routine, so I called back and left a voicemail. She called me back later day and made sure all my questions were answered. From the Dr., to the receptionist, to the women who checked me out, they all were very helpful. I would recommend this business to my friends and family for their excellent service!

name: Jenn C
text: My experience here was just wonderful! The staff was knowledgeable and helpful. Dr.  Gunn has a wonderful demeanor. She is gentle,  kind,  and reassuring  during examination. She addresses your concerns with medical and practical solutions to fit your budget and lifestyle.
